It doesn’t matter your age. It only matters your hard working ability as well as your creativity. There are few steps to follow. I will tell everything. Choose your pathYou need to choose what your favourite side is. This is the challenging part. Because of your age, you might still don’t know what is your best side. When I was 15 years old, I wanted to become a lawyer. But now I am writing articles. 😂 Ask from yourself. What topic you most like and which type of questions your friends asking or getting help from you. Then you will understand your category. Learn skills and practise moreYou must learn more and more about your path. May be article writing (then learn more about words, punctuations, how to write eye catching article and etc) or logo designing ( How to design logos easily, Color combinations, Platforms for best sellings )or web programming ( Newest web languages, Newest softwares to make web sites, domain providing sites) As you are enjoying it, always make or write or do things which will increase your skills. Because of that, you will gain lots of easy trucks to produce 100% quality product. Look at your competitors and learnFind best platforms where you cas sell your products and look for competitors. Always look at their prices, quality of products and how they delivery. Once I did logo designing and I saw competitors providing not only logos, but also a demo to show where to put logos and how they will looks like when logos are put in there. (Like boxes or web sites or letter head or any) Provide the best you canWhen you are in the business, take your time and think about every skill you have got serve the customer the best you can. Do not get rushed and provide a product with lots of errors. That will down your ratings which is not good. So always try to provide the beat you have got. All the best and give an upvote if you got any idea. Thank you
